      • showMap

        @GetMapping(value="/show")
public java.lang.String showMap(@RequestParam(value="type",required=false)
                                                            java.lang.String type,
                                                            @RequestParam(value="lat",required=false)
                                                            java.lang.Double latitude,
                                                            @RequestParam(value="long",required=false)
                                                            java.lang.Double longitude,
                                                            @RequestParam(value="r",required=false)
                                                            java.lang.Double radius,
                                                            @RequestParam(value="cluster",required=false)
                                                            java.lang.Boolean cluster,
                                                            org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        An endpoint method for showing the map and objects according to a search query. The query parameters are almost identical to those of DataQueryRestController.query(String, Double, Double, Double, boolean, Integer).
        Parameters:
        type -
        latitude -
        longitude -
        radius -
        cluster - If true, cluster results. If false, show markers for all results without clustering.
        model -
        Returns:
